biography: Jay Margalus is a game developer, primarily specializing in programming and business development. He is a co-owner of the Chicago game company Lunar Giant, creators of Delve Deeper, Mega Ran: The Game, and currently working on Project Libity. Jay also cofounded and served as an officer for the suburban hackerspace Workshop 88, and is the principle of the hackerspace SpaceLab 1 located in Mokena, Illinois. Jay also founded and chaired the non-profit IGDA Chicago, and currently chairs the Mokena Technology Committee, where he promotes and develops technology in the south suburbs.
